dict.acceptation: 挨饿；[非正式用语] 饥饿；受饿；[古语] 冻死；

sent.orig: You will not starve to death; nobody will starve to death in three days.
sent.trans: 你将不会饿死；没有人将会在三天中饿死。

sent.orig: The poor starve and the rich feast.
It's and starve and be brave, When the dawn of success is beginning.
sent.trans: 当胜利的曙光在望，你不畏劳苦，忍饥挨饿，依然勇往直前。

sent.orig: Then half the mice will starve and the others will run away.
sent.trans: 这样，一半的老鼠会饿死，另一半会逃之夭夭。

sent.orig: It knows it must outrun the slowest deer, or it will starve to death.
sent.trans: 它知道要快过最慢的鹿，否则就会饿死。
